abstract: Procter & Gamble announced Wednesday that it has snapped up Nioxin Research Laboratories, a maker of products to help combat thinning hair.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble announced Wednesday that it has snapped up Nioxin Research Laboratories, a maker of products to help combat thinning hair.

headline.main: Procter & Gamble Buys Maker of Thinning-Hair Products
